v8:item.v8:content: Service data update during active development phase, not accompanied with version increment or infobase update.

Used in the following configuration update scenarios: Changes to metadata components, renaming metadata objects. Changes to role rights. Changes to the %1 module. Changes to subscription types of the Access management subsystem events. Changes to the %2 module. Changes to the list of report options and their renaming. Changes to data integrity check components.
Map of references and full configuration metadata objects names. It is used instead of strings of full metadata objects names that are required to save in infobase.
Map of references and full metadata objects names of configuration extensions. It is used instead of strings of full metadata objects names that are required to save in infobase.
Contains a map between user groups and their parent groups and themselves. Intended for getting lower-level and higher-level groups in queries.
Contains a map of users to themselves and users groups. It is used in queries for receiving by users list and users list groups.
Contains a map of users to themselves and users groups. It is used in queries for receiving by users list and users list groups.
Report options cache received from metadata. It is used to speed up updates and in queries.
Contains report options (both retrieved from metadata and entered by users).
Notification at startup packages information register
Partial role rights for metadata objects, used to accelerate updating the Access group tables information register and generating the Access rights report.
Data from procedure when filling access kinds
Data from procedure when filling 1C-supplied access group profiles
Data from procedure when filling possible access rights to set up object rights
Access group profiles created from of 1C-supplied profiles.
Access group profiles created from of 1C-supplied profiles.
Infobase users list is available in designer. (in service model roles are updated only for separated users)
Data from Access restriction parameters information register
Data from Access group tables information register
Service data used in RLS templates. Data set depends on access group profiles and access groups.
Data from Access group values information register
Service data used in RLS templates. Data set depends on profiles and access groups.
Data from Inheritance of object permissions information register
Service data used in RLS templates. Data set depends on the hierarchy of permission owners and inheritors.
Service data from Object access rights information register
Service data used in RLS templates. Data set depends on permission settings.
Data from Access value groups information register
Service data used in RLS templates. Data set depends on access values and groups of access values.
Data from Access value sets information register
Data from Access restriction parameters information register
Data from procedure when filling access kinds
Data from procedure when filling 1C-supplied access group profiles
Data from procedure when filling possible access rights to set up object rights
Data from Access group tables information register
Data from Access group values information register
Service data from Object access rights information register
Data from Access value groups information register
Data from Inheritance of object permissions information register
Data from Access value sets information register
Notification at startup packages information register
Log out of the current data area
